instructions: Put the Dinner plate in the bottom middle portion of the tablecloth.
Put the salad plate directly in the middle of the dinner plate.
Put the napkin directly in the middle of the salad plate.
Place the wine glass in the top right portion of the tablecloth.
Put the water glass to the right of the wine glass and slightly below it.
Put the salad fork on the far left bottom portion of the tablecloth.  Point the fork facing up.
Put the dinner fork directly to the right of the salad fork.  Have it facing up.
Put the dinner knife directly to the right of the dinner plate.  Make it face upwards.
Put the soup spoon directly to the right of the dinner knife.  Make it point up.
